Class RMIClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.Client.Client
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.Client.RMIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
RMIClientInterface, Remote
public class RMIClient extends Client implements RMIClientInterface
Class representing the client. It uses the RMI connection
